title: Integrative Mind Body
cleaned_text: We, at Integrative Mind Body Medicine, take Covid-19 seriously and would like to highlight adjustments we have made in order to ensure patient safety during this time: - Each treatment room will have minimum of 1 hour of ventilation between clients - Each treatment room is supplied by HEPA air purifiers - Upon arrival you will be taken directly to your treatment room - Practitioner wears KN95 masks and requires all patients to wear masks - Adhere to CDC guidelines in regards to the upkeep of
